query.statement:
SELECT DISTINCT MM.LIFNR CODE ,MM.NAME1 CODE_NAME ,WB.ZZACTSS ,(SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS M WHERE M.MANDT = PS.MANDT AND M.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND M.LANG = #G_LANG# AND M.CODE2 = WB.ZZACTSS) AS ZZACTSS_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0002 PS ,SAPHEE.ZMMT012 MM ,SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB WHERE PS.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PS.MANDT = WB.MANDT AND PS.LIFNR = WB.LIFNR AND PS.MANDT = MM.MANDT AND PS.LIFNR = MM.LIFNR --AND MM.SORTL NOT LIKE '%Æó¾÷%' --AND PS.DELEF <> 'X' ORDER BY MM.NAME1
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
